title: RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module Datasheet > RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12002 Real-Time Clock Module Overview
content: The RAK12002 is a Real-Time Clock module, part of the RAK Wireless WisBlock Series, designed to provide real-time clock capabilities to your WisBlock projects. The RTC chip is based on the RV-3028-C7 from Micro Crystal and uses the I2C interface.
parent_content: The RAK12002 is a Real-Time Clock module, part of the RAK Wireless WisBlock Series, designed to provide real-time clock capabilities to your WisBlock projects. The RTC chip is based on the RV-3028-C7 from Micro Crystal and uses the I2C interface.

title: RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module Datasheet > RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12002 RTC Module Mounting on WisBlock Base Board
content:
The RAK12002 RTC module can be mounted on slot A, B, C, or D of the WisBlock Base board. Figure 1 shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12002 on a WisBlock Base board.  
> **Image:** RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module Mounting
parent_content:
The RAK12002 RTC module can be mounted on slot A, B, C, or D of the WisBlock Base board. Figure 1 shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12002 on a WisBlock Base board.  
> **Image:** RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module Mounting

title: RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module Datasheet > RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module Pinout [TABLE]
content:
The RAK12002 WisBlock RTC module includes a standard WisConnector. The WisConnector allows the RAK12002 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in Figure 2.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
**I2C** related pins,**INT**, **CLKOUT**, **3V3**, and **GND** are connected to WisConnector.  
> **Image:** RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module Pinout
parent_content:
The RAK12002 WisBlock RTC module includes a standard WisConnector. The WisConnector allows the RAK12002 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in Figure 2.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
**I2C** related pins,**INT**, **CLKOUT**, **3V3**, and **GND** are connected to WisConnector.  
> **Image:** RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module Pinout

content:
Figure 5 shows the RAK12002 RTC Module Schematic Diagram. C2 and C3 are supercapacitors, default uses C2, 70mF/3.3V, 11mF/3.3V for reserved.  
> **Image:** RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module Schematic
